body_html: TensorFlow 1.4.0 used a version of gRPC with some known bugs. TensorFlow 1.5 uses an upgraded version of gRPC, which may have fixed this problem. If you can reproduce the problem with TensorFlow 1.5, and share code for reproducing the problem, someone on the team can take a look.
